title: [a.f.k.] The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya - Season 2
description:
Season 2 of "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" fansubbed by [a.f.k.].

The [a.f.k.] translation is superior to the official DVDs, and the torrents collecting Season 1 and Season 2 of "Haruhi" mix them together into chronological order too, which I think messes them up.

I wanted to upload this to preserve the easy ability to watch Season 2 separately from Season 1, since keeping them separate is a much better way of watching the show.
 
This is a win for both laziness and curation
